string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
I want you to meet with someone. He will have a job for you. Do it and don’t ask any questions. Got it?
Good luck stalker.
Retrieve Lock Box for Sultan
Sultan needs the contents of a lock box returned to him.

I need you to retrieve a case for me. It’s hidden in a stash. Whatever else is in that stash is yours, but the case is mine. Deal? I will give you the rest of your reward when you have brought it back to me.
Excellent! You have done well.
Sultan’s Enemy
Sultan wants revenge on a stalker who cheated him.
A rat stalker has double-crossed me. No one messes with me and lives to see the next sunrise. Kill the asshole. I will make it worth your while.
Good. I should have told you to leave his head on a pike. No matter, everyone knows not to mess with Sultan. Here is your reward.
Kill the Rat
A fellow bandit has betrayed us. Sultan wants him eliminated.

There is a traitor in our midst. One of our own has betrayed us, but he doesn’t yet know that I know. He’ll be easy to get; just walk up to him, point your pistol at his face and pull the trigger. Just watch out for how his buddies react, you’ll probably have to kill them too. Talk to me again when he sleeps with the worms.
Good, you got rid of that asshole! Here is what I promised.
Search Lab X-16
Sultan has a buyer for some documents located inside Lab X-16 in Yantar.

I have a customer who is willing to pay well for some documents located inside that creepy lab over in Yantar. None of these pussies want to go in there because they think it is haunted. If you can get me those documents I’ll give you half of what he is paying me. What do you say? Or are you afraid of ghosts too?
Well done. Here is your cut.
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
Sorry, you must have the wrong guy. If you want to buy something, go ahead, but otherwise you can go bother someone else.
Good luck stalker.
%s Smuggler
Olivius needs %s smuggled past the military.

You know my contact in the Military? The one who used to look the other way when I brought weapons through the checkpoint? Can you believe that son of a bitch wants to start charging me a percentage? Fuck him. I want you to get my next shipment and sneak it past him.
Go pick up %s. Get them past that little shit and I’ll make it worth your while.
Yes, you have done well. Here’s your cut.
Kill the Double-Crosser
Olivius was double-crossed by a member of the Military and needs him to be taken care of.

You know our friend in the Military? The one who used to let us run weapons past the checkpoint if we slipped him a carton of cigarettes? That little shit now says he wants me to start paying a percentage every time or else he’s going to turn us in. Who the hell does he think he’s dealing with? I want him dead, you hear me? Dead! Bring me his head!
Good. Fuck that guy.
Pay Tribute To Sultan To Join Bandits
Sultan will let you join the Bandits but first you must pay him a 5,000 RU tribute.
You want to be a Bandit? Well, first you must pay tribute to Sultan… 5,000 RU. I don’t trust you so I want it up front.
Very good. Grab a vodka and go meet your fellow Bandits. They’re the finest scumbags in the Zone.
Mob Hit
Find and eliminate the target then return to Sultan for payment.

There are many people in the Zone who have rubbed me the wrong way or shown me disrespect. Some of these pricks either owe me money or fucked up some deal. These people are nothing but rats that need stomped out. If you are up for the task, I will give you their information so that you can track them through GPS.
Great work! Here’s a little something for your trouble:
Eliminate the Military Presence
Sultan wants you to eliminate any Military personnel in the area.
Those Military fucks are creeping around here again. Go take care of them.
Excellent work. You have done well.
Stalker Elimination
Eliminate the stalkers that attacked a fellow bandit.
A group of stalkers took a shot at one of our boys. Go take a couple guys and teach those pieces of shit a lesson.
Done? Good.
Eliminate Mutant Threat in Dark Valley
Mutants have been spotted near this location making the area dangerous. You have been tasked to eliminate the mutant threat within the area. Report back to Olivius after the job is done.

We’ve been looking for someone with enough balls to clear out mutants in a few places. Stalkers aren’t coming around here because they are too afraid. If we don’t do something about it we won’t have anyone left to “borrow” any goods from, then we will have to move out of this territory.
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I’ll make sure to put a good word in for you with the boss.
Eliminate Territorial Threat
You have been tasked to eliminate a territorial threat within the area. Report back to Olivius after the job is done.
Bitches are moving into our territory. The boss gave me orders to recruit a low life with enough balls to reclaim some of these camps. What do you say? Do you have enough hair on your chest?
Fantastic! Here is your payment. I’ll make sure to put a good word in for you with the boss.
Chiki-Briki i v Damke
Get the upper hand on local stalkers by relieving them of their valuables long enough until your band of merry men are satisfied.
There are a few guys who are looking for another to join up with them for a while. They need a scout to take them out looking for prime targets and will pay you once your job is done.
Nice take, eh? Here is your cut.
Hit Man
Olivius has contracted you to run a hit. Find and eliminate the target then return to him for payment.
I have a list of people who have rubbed me the wrong way. I want you to rub them out. What do you say?
Good, you got rid of that asshole! Here is what I promised.
Find %s for Limpid
%s are required by Limpid to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I’m in desperate need of new tools, man. I can’t do anything with the rusty shit I have and I’m running out of gun oil. If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I need.
I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Perfect! This is just what I need, man. I can properly upgrade gear now!
Find %s for Limpid
%s are required by Limpid to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn’t have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an %s. I’m not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
You followed through again! Good deal, man, here is some money.
Find %s for Limpid
%s are required by Limpid to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
The toolkit you brought me is great, but it doesn’t have everything I need. Do you think you can find me a better set?
I need an %s. I’m not sure where you can get one of these, but if you can find one, I need it.
You followed through again! Good deal, man, here is some money.
Lead the way and we will follow. You will get your cut when we are done. Just make sure we are the ones doing the looting and watch our backs.
We should get moving - my trigger finger is getting itchy. Just remember, we get the loot!
You did your job well. Here is your cut.
Okay.
